topics.name: test_topic

statements: CREATE TABLE TEST (ID BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, NAME varchar, VALUE map<varchar, date>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='PROTOBUF');
CREATE TABLE S2 as SELECT ID, collect_list(value['key1']) AS collected FROM test group by id;
